title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Liam goes to extreme lengths to keep Joel from revealing the truth
text:
(Picture: Lime Pictures)

Mercedes McQueen (Jennifer Metcalfe) has had a lot to cope with this year in Hollyoaks, but her past mistakes could be about to haunt her once more if Joel Dexter (Rory Douglas-Speed) reveals the truth about the hit-and-run. Desperate, Mercedes goes to old flame Liam Donovan (Jude Monk McGowan) in the hopes that he will be able to help her out of this predicament. The question is: how far will Liam go in order to keep his and Mercedes’ secret hidden?

Earlier this year, Liam tried to cheer up a sullen Mercedes, so the pair stole Harry’s (Parry Glasspool) new vehicle and went out for a joyride. However, during said joyride, an argument broke out, and the lovers ended up knocking down Grace (Tamara Wall).

Afterwards, Harry became prime suspect in the police investigation into the incident and Grace held him personally responsible. Harry discovered the truth and managed to record Mercedes’ threatening confession, but Breda McQueen (Moya Brady) viciously murdered him before he could inform everyone of the truth.

However, in the coming episodes, Joel discovers Harry’s phone — and stumbles upon the recording of Mercedes confessing to the hit-and-run. Afterwards, he heads to The Dog to play it aloud for Mercedes, before informing her that he’ll give her one chance to tell her family before he goes to the police.

Unable to think of a solution, Mercedes turns to the one person who’s always been there to help her out of tricky situations in the past. After tracking Liam down, she informs him of what’s happened and, as per usual, Liam promises to help her. However, he wants something in return.

He tries to break in to the McQueens household whilst Joel and Goldie (Chelsee Healey) are asleep. Later, he tries to bribe Joel in to giving him the phone back.

On Liam’s actions, actor Jude Monk McGowan said: ‘Predictably, he tries to buy Joel off. He tries to use the fairest means possible to get Joel to keep the information to himself. When this inevitably fails, he has to use a bit more forceful and violent means in doing it.’

Liam’s proven just how relentless he can be when it comes to those he cares about, so he’ll no doubt pull out all the stops to protect the woman he loves.

The question is: just how violent will his actions get?

Could Liam perhaps kill Joel so that his and Mercy’s secret remains hidden forever? With a big stunt week coming up, it’s certainly a possibility.

Hollyoaks continues Friday 10th October at 7pm on E4.
